== FrOSCamp 2010 Zurich ==

=== Date and time ===

The booth will be on Friday and Saturday, 17/18 September at the ETH Zurich.

<nowiki>[[http://www.froscamp.org/|FrOSCamp Website]]</nowiki> - <nowiki>[[http://wiki.froscamp.org/2010:Exhibitors|Exhibitors]]</nowiki>

Entry in the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/220/detail/|LoCo Team Events]]</nowiki> page. Please all, add yourself as attending.

=== Booth layout ===

=== Booth material ===

MyriamSchweingruber will bring Kubuntu CDs and the conference pack, Daniel Stoni will bring the CDs, Swiss remix and team pack.
